name: Notion Student Hub Premium
description: Hello, Welcome to the Student Hub Premium. After the success of the student hub (free version) I decided to build a premium hub that is:Beautifully designedEasy to use and to customizeHas way more feature and resourcesHere's what's inside:Classes Hub: This hub integrates the Cornell Note System, creating a dedicated space for each class's materials. It also contains more than 50 resources of websites and learning tools.Food Hub: This hub features a recipe book, a shopping list, and even a cookin
features: Beautifully designed; Easy to use and to customize; Has way more feature and resources; Classes Hub:This hub integrates the Cornell Note System, creating a dedicated space for each class's materials. It also contains more than 50 resources of websites and learning tools.; Food Hub:This hub features a recipe book, a shopping list, and even a cooking playlist. It's designed to help you document the easiest recipes for your go-to student life.
